mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PAY_TRADE (ID, ORDER_TRADE_NO, PAY_TYPE, PAY_BANK, GOODS_NAME, REMARK, TOTAL_FEE, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE_FORMAT, BP_ID,BP_ORDER_ID, ORDER_URL, SHOW_URL, CONTENT, NOTIFY_URL, RETURN_URL, PAY_DATE, PAY_DATE_FORMAT, PAY_SERIAL_NUMBER, CREATE_DATE_MONTH, CREATE_DATE_DAY, CREATE_DATE_QUARTER, PAY_DATE_MONTH, PAY_DATE_DAY, PAY_DATE_QUARTER,
UNID,
USERNAME,NOTIFY_DATE,NOTIFY_NUM, NOTIFY_STATUS, BP_PARAMS, NOTIFY_ID, INIT_ORDER_TERMINAL,FINAL_PAY_TERMINAL, PAY_LIMIT,PAY_IP,PAY_UNID,PAY_CURRENCY,MER_CODE,PAY_SERVICE,GOODS_CONTENT,NEED_PAY_PRICE,PAY_PARTNER,PAY_MEDIUM_CODE) VALUES(S_PAY_TRADE.NEXTVAL, #{orderTradeNo},#{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalFee},#{status},#{createDate},#{createDateFormat},#{bpId},#{bpOrderId}, #{orderUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{showUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{returnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{payDateFormat,jdbcType=DATE},#{paySerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createDateMonth},#{createDateDay},#{createDateQuarter}, #{payDateMonth,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{payDateDay,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{payDateQuarter,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{unid},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{notifyDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{notifyNum},#{notifyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{notifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initOrderTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{finalPayTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payUnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payService,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{goodsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needPayPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{payPartner,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{payMediumCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAY_TRADE T WHERE T.CREATE_DATE >= #{beginTimeStamp} AND T.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTimeStamp} AND T.STATUS = 1) WHERE ROWNUM < 101
